name: Naruto: Epic Ninja
description:
This is my ninja way!

Unlock all characters!

Ninjas from Konoha, Akatsuki members, and the past for the famous heroes of the shinobi world are available to you!

Sasuke Uchiha, Kakashi Hatake, Kisame Hoshigake and many more ninjas are already in the game!

Make combinations!

Perform challenging techniques and defeat your enemies! Discover new jutsu!

Defeat your opponents from the Bingo Book!

Complete missions!

The Third Hokage and Pain already have tasks for you!

Learn the story of each character from the Naruto world!

The game has been translated into the following languages:

  • Русский
  • English
  • Español
  • Português
  • Français
